signup.signInLink: Already have an account? Sign in

closeAccount.title: Close Account
closeAccount.heading: Close your account
closeAccount.subHeading: Caution! This action is irreversible. Your data will be deleted and your account will be closed immediately.
closeAccount.confirmationModalDescription: This action is irreversible. Your data will be deleted and your account will be closed immediately.
closeAccount.closeAccountConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to close your account and delete all your data?
closeAccount.closeAccountErrorMessage: An error occurred while trying to close your account. Please try again.
